name: discordify
description: A plugin for better discord that gives you pause/queue and playback control

scripts.build: babel --presets @babel/preset-react ./src/discordify.js --out-file plugin/discordify.plugin.js && terser ./plugin/discordify.plugin.js -o ./plugin/discordify.plugin.js --config-file terser.json && sass src/discordify.scss plugin/discordify.css --no-source-map
